entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , White River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:41 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -9.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 6:15 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -9.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -13.0°C
Wind: SW 22 km/h gust 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:29 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:29 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 5:29 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
